physical_appearance:The image shows an artist\u0027s proof. It is rectangular in shape. The proof is encased within a black frame.It features the metal structure of a building
 which is red in colour. A construction worker can be seen sitting atop a metal beam. He is wearing a blue helmet and is using a hammer on the bolts in the steel structure.

sgcool_label_text:This photograph was taken by Singaporean photographer Tan Lip Seng. His works in the 1960s were a result of various experiments meticulously combining multiple colour transparencies into one to achieve the desired montage within one frame.\r\n\r\nTan Lip Seng started his career as a medical photographer at the National University of Singapore. He is famous worldwide for his innovative colour derivative photo montage technique as well as his travel photography.\r\n

metadata.sgcool_label_text:
This photograph was taken by Singaporean photographer Tan Lip Seng. His works in the 1960s were a result of various experiments meticulously combining multiple colour transparencies into one to achieve the desired montage within one frame.

Tan Lip Seng started his career as a medical photographer at the National University of Singapore. He is famous worldwide for his innovative colour derivative photo montage technique as well as his travel photography.
